name: part_009
file: tmp_【#ときのそらお披露目誕生日2022】HappyMeowthday!!な3D配信！！ [hrpubiRwB-k]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora performs 'Hibana' with IRyS appearing in a picture frame.
Tokino Sora performs 'Satsunatic Code' with guest AZKi.

subtitles.original: aiya aiya わかってくれるでしょう
subtitles.english: Aiya, aiya, surely you understand.

subtitles.original: その頭を撃ち抜いて
subtitles.english: Shoot through that head of yours.

subtitles.original: 終わんない愛を抱いてたくないの
subtitles.english: I don't want to hold onto an endless love.

subtitles.original: もっとちゃんと不安にしてよ
subtitles.english: Make me feel more properly anxious.

subtitles.original: いないいないばあでしてほしいの
subtitles.english: I want you to play peek-a-boo with me.

subtitles.original: もっとちゃんと応えてよ
subtitles.english: Give me a better response.

subtitles.original: nananana...
subtitles.english: nananana...

subtitles.original: 未完成だって何度でも言うんだ
subtitles.english: I'll say it again and again, it's incomplete.

subtitles.original: nananana...
subtitles.english: nananana...

subtitles.original: NOを空振った愛の中で
subtitles.english: In a love where 'NO' missed its mark.

subtitles.original: トントン、これでお相子さ
subtitles.english: Knock, knock, now we're even.

subtitles.original: 生まれない時に籠っちゃって
subtitles.english: Shutting yourself away in a time that's never born.

subtitles.original: 完全主義はスモーキーに
subtitles.english: Perfectionism turns smoky.

subtitles.original: 言及（ことば）す声に目眩とモノトーンに
subtitles.english: Dizziness and monotone in the mentioning voice.

subtitles.original: Don't stop, go in and get the ace
subtitles.english: Don't stop, go in and get the ace

subtitles.original: You'll be a face with gears that all feel the same
subtitles.english: You'll be a face with gears that all feel the same

subtitles.original: Now heart-be and force you to end this game
subtitles.english: Now heart-be and force you to end this game

subtitles.original: You better give up and throw your MP5 away
subtitles.english: You better give up and throw your MP5 away

subtitles.original: aiya こっちも選んで
subtitles.english: Aiya, choose this way too.

subtitles.original: aiya どっちも壊して
subtitles.english: Aiya, break both of them.

subtitles.original: 心の根を引き抜いて
subtitles.english: Pull out the roots of the heart.

subtitles.original: 不甲斐ない愛を愛してたくないの
subtitles.english: I don't want to love a pathetic love.

subtitles.original: もっとちゃんとデクしてよ
subtitles.english: Treat me more like a puppet.

subtitles.original: 笑えないくらいがきっと楽しいの
subtitles.english: It's surely more fun when you can't even laugh.

subtitles.original: もっとちゃんと溶かしてよ
subtitles.english: Melt me more properly.

subtitles.original: nananana...
subtitles.english: nananana...

subtitles.original: 未完成だって何度でも言うんだ
subtitles.english: I'll say it again and again, it's incomplete.

subtitles.original: nananana...
subtitles.english: nananana...

subtitles.original: NOを空振った愛の中で
subtitles.english: In a love where 'NO' missed its mark.

subtitles.original: そら先輩、お誕生日おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Sora-senpai, happy birthday!

subtitles.original: IRySちゃんありがとう！
subtitles.english: IRyS-chan, thank you!

subtitles.original: 出してくれて嬉しい
subtitles.english: I'm so glad you could join me!

subtitles.original: 一緒に歌えて最高！
subtitles.english: Singing together is the best!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Love you so much!
subtitles.english: Love you so much!

subtitles.original: aiya そんなわけないや
subtitles.english: Aiya, it can't be like that.

subtitles.original: aiya わかってくれるでしょう
subtitles.english: Aiya, surely you understand.

subtitles.original: その頭を撃ち抜いて
subtitles.english: Shoot through that head of yours.

subtitles.english: Shoot through it.

subtitles.english: I don't want to hold onto an endless love.

subtitles.original: NOを空振った愛の中で
subtitles.english: In a love where 'NO' missed its mark.

subtitles.original: AZKiちゃんと刹那ティックコード！
subtitles.english: Satsunatic Code with AZKi-chan!

subtitles.original: そらちゃん誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Sora-chan, happy birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: SorAzuいくぞー！
subtitles.english: Here we go, SorAzu!

subtitles.original: いくぞー！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: いつだって 未来のためばかり
subtitles.english: Always focusing only on the future,

subtitles.original: 「今」という時間を費やすけれど
subtitles.english: we spend the time that is 'now'.

subtitles.original: 今だけは 今だけを 感じ合うことができたら
subtitles.english: But if for just now, we could feel only this moment together,

subtitles.original: 臆（おく）にして 立ちすくんだ 心がもう一度動き出すよ
subtitles.english: my heart that stood frozen in fear will begin to move once more.

subtitles.original: 震え出しそうだ
subtitles.english: It feels like it's about to tremble.

subtitles.original: 胸の痛みも 涙の訳も すべて
subtitles.english: The pain in my chest, the reasons for my tears, everything—

subtitles.original: 強さに変えて
subtitles.english: I'll turn it into strength.

subtitles.original: 飲み込んだ想い 仰いだ空に 飛ばせ
subtitles.english: Let the swallowed thoughts fly into the sky I looked up at.

subtitles.original: つながるメロディ 流れる星に 変わってく
subtitles.english: The connecting melody turns into a shooting star.

subtitles.original: 君のために歌うよ 君に届くようにと
subtitles.english: I'll sing for you, so that it may reach you.

subtitles.original: 輝きは 世界軸（じく）を越えて
subtitles.english: The radiance transcends the world's axis.

subtitles.original: 確かにここで 重ね合えた 鼓動（コード）
subtitles.english: The heartbeat (code) that surely overlapped right here.

subtitles.original: 触れ合う音が 光になって 降り注ぐ
subtitles.english: The touching sounds become light and rain down.

subtitles.original: この一瞬が 永遠へと
subtitles.english: Let this moment lead to eternity.

subtitles.original: 煌めいては 色付いてゆく 君と描いた世界
subtitles.english: The world I painted with you is sparkling and taking on color.

subtitles.original: いつだって 朝はくるだなんて
subtitles.english: They say the morning always comes,

subtitles.original: 来てほしくない 朝もあるけど
subtitles.english: but there are mornings I don't want to arrive.
